title: Champ Select Glich
body: When i wanted to remove one of my leaver busters i finally clicked on accept for match and then everything glitched my friends told me that i left champion select and i freaked (phreaked xD <3) out!

replies.body: Oh no, that sucks and certainly doesn't make leaverbuster or dodge penalties any better for you.  I want to help but could use some more info.  For example, are you getting any error messages?  What do you mean by glitches?  I recommend sticking to custom games for now, but toss me some more details so I can help.
